item.title: [Delta] Fix Combat Lag [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

[quote=“enzo42, post:11, topic:518156”][quote author=Scape-JAVA link=topic=636421.msg4292596#msg4292596 date=1367603528]

this will only fix the lag when leveling up lol

fixing delta’s combat requires it to be re-written

No it’s every time it adds exp.

no. delta’s combat would have to be rewritten.
[/quote]

This does fix the attacking lag, but the combat system remains shitty and should still be rewritten yes.[/quote]
I agree with it having to be rewritten :D. Just thought to post this to help some people but rewriting would defiantly be the best option.

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Fix Combat Lag [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

[quote=“gunz4life, post:4, topic:518156”] public void SkillUpdate(int SKILL) { if (SKILL == 0) { c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[0] + "", 4004); c.sendQuest("" + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[0]) + "", 4005); c.sendQuest("" + c.playerXP[0] + "", 4044); c.sendQuest("" + c.getXPForLevel(c.playerLevel[0] + 1) + "", 4045); } if (SKILL == 1) { c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[1] + "", 4008); c.sendQuest("" + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]) + "", 4009); c.sendQuest("" + c.playerXP[1] + "", 4056); c.sendQuest("" + c.getXPForLevel(c.playerLevel[1] + 1) + "", 4057); } if (SKILL == 2) { c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[2] + "", 4006); c.sendQuest("" + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]) + "", 4007); c.sendQuest("" + c.playerXP[2] + "", 4050); c.sendQuest("" + c.getXPForLevel(c.playerLevel[2] + 1) + "", 4051); } if (SKILL == 3) { c.sendQuest("" + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]) + "", 4017); c.sendQuest("" + c.currentHealth + "", 4016); c.sendQuest("" + c.playerXP[3] + "", 4080); c.sendQuest("" + c.getXPForLevel(c.playerLevel[3] + 1) + "", 4081); } if (SKILL == 4) { c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[4] + "", 4010); c.sendQuest("" + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[4]) + "", 4011); c.sendQuest("" + c.playerXP[4] + "", 4062); c.sendQuest("" + c.getXPForLevel(c.playerLevel[4] + 1) + "", 4063); } if (SKILL == 5) { c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[5] + "", 4012); c.sendQuest("" + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]) + "", 4013); c.sendQuest("" + c.playerXP[5] + "", 4068); c.sendQuest("" + c.getXPForLevel(c.playerLevel[5] + 1) + "", 4069); } if (SKILL == 6) { c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[6] + "", 4014); c.sendQuest("" + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[6]) + "", 4015); c.sendQuest("" + c.playerXP[6] + "", 4074); c.sendQuest("" + c.getXPForLevel(c.playerLevel[6] + 1) + "", 4075); } if (SKILL == 7) { c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[7] + "", 4034); c.sendQuest("" + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[7]) + "", 4035); c.sendQuest("" + c.playerXP[7] + "", 4134); c.sendQuest("" + c.getXPForLevel(c.playerLevel[7] + 1) + "", 4135); } if (SKILL == 8) { c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[8] + "", 4038); c.sendQuest("" + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[8]) + "", 4039); c.sendQuest("" + c.playerXP[8] + "", 4146); c.sendQuest("" + c.getXPForLevel(c.playerLevel[8] + 1) + "", 4147); } if (SKILL == 10) { c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[10] + "", 4032); c.sendQuest("" + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[10]) + "", 4033); c.sendQuest("" + c.playerXP[10] + "", 4128); c.sendQuest("" + c.getXPForLevel(c.playerLevel[10] + 1) + "", 4129); } if (SKILL == 11) { c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[11] + "", 4036); c.sendQuest("" + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[11]) + "", 4037); c.sendQuest("" + c.playerXP[11] + "", 4140); c.sendQuest("" + c.getXPForLevel(c.playerLevel[11] + 1) + "", 4141); } if (SKILL == 12) { c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[12] + "", 4024); c.sendQuest("" + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[12]) + "", 4025); c.sendQuest("" + c.playerXP[12] + "", 4104); c.sendQuest("" + c.getXPForLevel(c.playerLevel[12] + 1) + "", 4105); } if (SKILL == 13) { c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[13] + "", 4030); c.sendQuest("" + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[13]) + "", 4031); c.sendQuest("" + c.playerXP[13] + "", 4122); c.sendQuest("" + c.getXPForLevel(c.playerLevel[13] + 1) + "", 4123); } if (SKILL == 14) { c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[14] + "", 4028); c.sendQuest("" + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[14]) + "", 4029); c.sendQuest("" + c.playerXP[14] + "", 4116); c.sendQuest("" + c.getXPForLevel(c.playerLevel[14] + 1) + "", 4117); } if (SKILL == 15) { c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[15] + "", 4020); c.sendQuest("" + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[15]) + "", 4021); c.sendQuest("" + c.playerXP[15] + "", 4092); c.sendQuest("" + c.getXPForLevel(c.playerLevel[15] + 1) + "", 4093); } if (SKILL == 16) { c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[16] + "", 4018); c.sendQuest("" + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[16]) + "", 4019); c.sendQuest("" + c.playerXP[16] + "", 4086); c.sendQuest("" + c.getXPForLevel(c.playerLevel[16] + 1) + "", 4087); } if (SKILL == 17) { c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[17] + "", 4022); c.sendQuest("" + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[17]) + "", 4023); c.sendQuest("" + c.playerXP[17] + "", 4098); c.sendQuest("" + c.getXPForLevel(c.playerLevel[17] + 1) + "", 4099); } if (SKILL == 18) { c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[18] + "", 12166); c.sendQuest("" + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[18]) + "", 12167); c.sendQuest("" + c.playerXP[18] + "", 12171); c.sendQuest("" + c.getXPForLevel(c.playerLevel[18] + 1) + "", 12172); } if (SKILL == 19) { c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[19] + "", 13926); c.sendQuest("" + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[19]) + "", 13927); c.sendQuest("" + c.playerXP[19] + "", 13921); c.sendQuest("" + c.getXPForLevel(c.playerLevel[19] + 1) + "", 13922); } if (SKILL == 20) { c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[20] + "", 4152); c.sendQuest("" + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[20]) + "", 4153); c.sendQuest("" + c.playerXP[20] + "", 4157); c.sendQuest("" + c.getXPForLevel(c.playerLevel[20] + 1) + "", 4158); } }

can be shorten down to

public void SkillUpdate(int SKILL) { for (int i = 0; i < 21; i++) { if (SKILL == i) { c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[i] + "", 4004); c.sendQuest("" + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[i]) + "", 4005); c.sendQuest("" + c.playerXP[i] + "", 4044); c.sendQuest("" + c.getXPForLevel(c.playerLevel[i] + 1) + "", 4045); } } }

http://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/java/nutsandbolts/for.html[/quote]

It can’t because it is adding exp on different lines like

c.sendQuest("" + c.getXPForLevel(c.playerLevel[i] + 1) + “”, 4045);

and

c.sendQuest("" + c.getXPForLevel(c.playerLevel[20] + 1) + “”, 4158);

But thanks for contributing

Unless im totally wrong

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta] Fix Combat Lag [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

I found this tutorial a long time ago and I think the forum i found it on got closed now, but i realized some delta’s don’t have this so here.

Credits 95% to whoever made this.
Credits 5% to me For Adding Member Skills

Make a new file called Level.java

In it add:

[code]public class Level
{
client c;

public Level(client c) {
this.c = c;
}

public void SkillUpdate(int SKILL) {
if (SKILL == 0) {
c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[0] + “”, 4004);
c.sendQuest("" + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[0]) + “”, 4005);
c.sendQuest("" + c.playerXP[0] + “”, 4044);
c.sendQuest("" + c.getXPForLevel(c.playerLevel[0] + 1) + “”, 4045);
}
if (SKILL == 1) {
c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[1] + “”, 4008);
c.sendQuest("" + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]) + “”, 4009);
c.sendQuest("" + c.playerXP[1] + “”, 4056);
c.sendQuest("" + c.getXPForLevel(c.playerLevel[1] + 1) + “”, 4057);
}
if (SKILL == 2) {
c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[2] + “”, 4006);
c.sendQuest("" + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[2]) + “”, 4007);
c.sendQuest("" + c.playerXP[2] + “”, 4050);
c.sendQuest("" + c.getXPForLevel(c.playerLevel[2] + 1) + “”, 4051);
}
if (SKILL == 3) {
c.sendQuest("" + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[3]) + “”, 4017);
c.sendQuest("" + c.currentHealth + “”, 4016);
c.sendQuest("" + c.playerXP[3] + “”, 4080);
c.sendQuest("" + c.getXPForLevel(c.playerLevel[3] + 1) + “”, 4081);
}
if (SKILL == 4) {
c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[4] + “”, 4010);
c.sendQuest("" + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[4]) + “”, 4011);
c.sendQuest("" + c.playerXP[4] + “”, 4062);
c.sendQuest("" + c.getXPForLevel(c.playerLevel[4] + 1) + “”, 4063);
}
if (SKILL == 5) {
c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[5] + “”, 4012);
c.sendQuest("" + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[5]) + “”, 4013);
c.sendQuest("" + c.playerXP[5] + “”, 4068);
c.sendQuest("" + c.getXPForLevel(c.playerLevel[5] + 1) + “”, 4069);
}
if (SKILL == 6) {
c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[6] + “”, 4014);
c.sendQuest("" + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[6]) + “”, 4015);
c.sendQuest("" + c.playerXP[6] + “”, 4074);
c.sendQuest("" + c.getXPForLevel(c.playerLevel[6] + 1) + “”, 4075);
}
if (SKILL == 7) {
c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[7] + “”, 4034);
c.sendQuest("" + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[7]) + “”, 4035);
c.sendQuest("" + c.playerXP[7] + “”, 4134);
c.sendQuest("" + c.getXPForLevel(c.playerLevel[7] + 1) + “”, 4135);
}
if (SKILL == 8) {
c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[8] + “”, 4038);
c.sendQuest("" + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[8]) + “”, 4039);
c.sendQuest("" + c.playerXP[8] + “”, 4146);
c.sendQuest("" + c.getXPForLevel(c.playerLevel[8] + 1) + “”, 4147);
}
if (SKILL == 10) {
c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[10] + “”, 4032);
c.sendQuest("" + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[10]) + “”, 4033);
c.sendQuest("" + c.playerXP[10] + “”, 4128);
c.sendQuest("" + c.getXPForLevel(c.playerLevel[10] + 1) + “”, 4129);
}
if (SKILL == 11) {
c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[11] + “”, 4036);
c.sendQuest("" + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[11]) + “”, 4037);
c.sendQuest("" + c.playerXP[11] + “”, 4140);
c.sendQuest("" + c.getXPForLevel(c.playerLevel[11] + 1) + “”, 4141);
}
if (SKILL == 12) {
c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[12] + “”, 4024);
c.sendQuest("" + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[12]) + “”, 4025);
c.sendQuest("" + c.playerXP[12] + “”, 4104);
c.sendQuest("" + c.getXPForLevel(c.playerLevel[12] + 1) + “”, 4105);
}
if (SKILL == 13) {
c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[13] + “”, 4030);
c.sendQuest("" + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[13]) + “”, 4031);
c.sendQuest("" + c.playerXP[13] + “”, 4122);
c.sendQuest("" + c.getXPForLevel(c.playerLevel[13] + 1) + “”, 4123);
}
if (SKILL == 14) {
c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[14] + “”, 4028);
c.sendQuest("" + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[14]) + “”, 4029);
c.sendQuest("" + c.playerXP[14] + “”, 4116);
c.sendQuest("" + c.getXPForLevel(c.playerLevel[14] + 1) + “”, 4117);
}
if (SKILL == 15) {
c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[15] + “”, 4020);
c.sendQuest("" + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[15]) + “”, 4021);
c.sendQuest("" + c.playerXP[15] + “”, 4092);
c.sendQuest("" + c.getXPForLevel(c.playerLevel[15] + 1) + “”, 4093);
}
if (SKILL == 16) {
c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[16] + “”, 4018);
c.sendQuest("" + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[16]) + “”, 4019);
c.sendQuest("" + c.playerXP[16] + “”, 4086);
c.sendQuest("" + c.getXPForLevel(c.playerLevel[16] + 1) + “”, 4087);
}
if (SKILL == 17) {
c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[17] + “”, 4022);
c.sendQuest("" + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[17]) + “”, 4023);
c.sendQuest("" + c.playerXP[17] + “”, 4098);
c.sendQuest("" + c.getXPForLevel(c.playerLevel[17] + 1) + “”, 4099);
}
if (SKILL == 18) {
c.sendQuest("" + c.playerLevel[18] + “”, 12166);
c.sendQuest("" + c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[18]) + “”, 12167);
c.sendQuest("" + c.playerXP[18] + “”, 12171);
c.sendQuest("" + c.getXPForLevel(c.playerLevel[18] + 1) + “”, 12172);
